project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV Files
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that analyzes a CSV file by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to read a CSV file
Implement functionality to calculate mean for specified numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate median for specified numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for the CSV reading and statistical calculation functions
Execute tests on all functionalities to ensure they function correctly
